components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Orange Network in Botswana

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Orange Network in Botswana. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Reports Delays to MTN Network in Multiple African Countries

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience delays in receiving SMS delivery reports to MTN network in multiple African countries. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. SMS delivery is not impacted for this problem. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery and Calls Failure from and to Smart Telecom Network in Nepal

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery and Calls failures from and to Smart Telecom network in Nepal. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Telcell Network in Zimbabwe for Non-OTP Messages

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telecel Network in Zimbabwe. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours (daily) or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 30 May 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from below countries.
Azerbaijan Bakcell Ltd (BAKCELL GSM 2000)
Azerbaijan Azerfon LLC (Nar Mobile)
Azerbaijan NAXTEL
Croatia Tele2
Israel Golan Telecom
Israel Xphone
Israel Telzar
Myanmar Mytel
Nepal Smart
Pakistan UFone
Philippines Globe
Slovenia TusMobil/VEGA
Uzbekistan UCell (Coscom)
Uzbekistan UMS Mobiuz

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier partner Maintenance

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.
